document.full_text: senior members of tunisia's former ruling party will be banned from a july 24 election and the vote will be run by an independent body for the first time, prime minister beji caid sebsi said on tuesday.
document.title: tunisia bans ex-ruling party leaders from ballot
lines_and_colors: senior members of tunisia's former ruling party will be banned from a july 24 election and the vote will be run by an independent body for the first time, prime minister beji caid sebsi said on tuesday.
